channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: How federal consent decrees have been used in police reform across the US
item.description: The Justice Department announced Wednesday it was canceling proposed consent decrees reached with Minneapolis and Louisville to implement policing reforms in the wake of high profile police killings.

item.title: New Orleans jail worker thought he was unclogging a toilet, not helping 10 escape, lawyer says
